amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), insert the following: TITLE IX--ADDITIONAL GENERAL PROVISION SEC. 901. None of the funds made available in this Act may be used to purchase light bulbs unless the light bulbs have the "ENERGY STAR" or "Federal Energy Management Program" designation.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit funds to be used to purchase light bulbs unless the light bulbs have the "ENERGY STAR" or "Federal Energy Management Program" designation.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Inglis (SC) amendment (A009) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A009) offered by Mr. Inglis (SC).
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Inglis (SC) amendment (A009) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
